detail_desc: Pyjama top and shorts in soft satin. V-neck cami top with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with narrow elastication at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Fitted jumper in a rib-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and deep V-neck.
Underwired bra in lace with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and chest pocket. Partly concealed press-stud fastening at the crotch and down the legs.
Jacket in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Zipped chest pocket and zipped front pockets. Mesh lining.
Jumper a soft, waffle-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Chinos in soft, washed twill made from a cotton and linen blend. Extended waistband with a button, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and adjustable tabs at the sides. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Low cut at the back, round, elastic shoulder straps, a lined gusset and a string back.
Short, straight-cut lace dress with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back, padded shoulders and long sleeves. Partly lined.
Fully lined, crinkled swimsuit with high-cut legs and medium coverage at the back. The polyester content of the swimsuit is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist and concealed key pocket in the waistband. Unlined. The shorts are made partly from recycled polyester.

Ankle-length dress in a softly draping weave with a V-neck and decorative pleats front and back. Long sleeves and wide, flared cuffs with a slit. Seam at the waist and a softly draping skirt with pleats at the top and a box pleat and concealed slit at the front. Unlined.

Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Front pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets, flap leg pockets, seams at the knees and narrow hems.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Oversized shirt in fine-ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Sports armband with a touchscreen window for smartphones, adjustable hook and loop fastening and earphone outlet at the bottom. Fits smartphones up to 7x14 cm.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1.2 cm to 3 cm.

Wide, straight-cut parka in a lightweight weave. Lined hood with an elastic drawstring and decorative stitching, and a zip and wind flap with press studs down the front. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Loose yoke with a pleat at the back, front pockets, a concealed elasticated drawstring at the waist and hem, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short dress in a crisp cotton weave with flounced trims at the top. Wrapover front with narrow ties at the waist and long puff sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Lined skirt.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a V-neck and gently rounded hem.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and half-string back.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 50x50 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings. Top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and appliquéd print motifs above the hems.
Cap with a sweatband in a cotton weave and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and 3/4-length sleeves with pleats and buttons at the cuffs. Seam and a detachable D-ring belt at the waist. Unlined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidery detail on the chest and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirts in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Short, A-line dungaree dress in washed denim with a chest pocket and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Buttons at the sides and a raw-edge, frayed hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shorts in ribbed, organic cotton jersey with concealed, adjustable elastication at the waist and a fake fly.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a button and narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with an asymmetric hem. Jersey lining. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Leotard in glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Lined gusset.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck top in cotton jersey.

prod_name: Jade Trash HW Skinny Denim TRS
detail_desc: High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, back pockets and skinny legs.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Fleece duffle coat with a detachable, pile-lined hood, patch front pockets, toggles at the front and a yoke at the back. Pile lining.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Loose-fitting blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck at the front and yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with pleats, a small opening and ties at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Straight-cut dress in an airy viscose weave with a round neckline and short, open sleeves with ties at the ends. Unlined.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a robust, square silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.2 cm.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck, wrapover front and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with narrow, sewn-in ties that fasten at one side, and a wrapover skirt.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Long-sleeved dress in patterned jersey made from recycled polyester. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the top, and a seam with smocking under the bust and at the cuffs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a lace trim at the hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in jersey with a sheen. Draping front and back and gathered sleeves.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.

Short dress in woven fabric containing glittery threads with a round, frill-trimmed neckline and small opening with ties at the front. Short sleeves with elasticated frill trims, a smocked seam at the waist and a frill-trimmed seam and flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a detachable belt, long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar, an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and wide, 3/4-length raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a gathered seam and flounce at the hem for added volume. Sewn-in, V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The underdress is made from recycled polyester.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in a textured weave with fringe trims, decorative chest pockets and front pockets with a metal button. No buttons. Lined.
Thin metal chain necklace with a ring-shaped metal pendant. Adjustable length, approx. 42-48 cm.
Jacket in washed stretch denim with a collar, flap chest pockets with a button, and buttoned cuffs.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, button fly and raw-edge hems.
High-waisted velvet trousers with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly and straight, wide legs.
Hat in a soft, rib-knit cashmere and wool blend.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with quilted sections, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered motif on the turned-up hem.

Small shoulder bag in imitation suede and imitation leather with a metal chain shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, one inner compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 5x15.5x20 cm.

V-neck dress in microfibre with lace details, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a folded, glued edge at the top and laser-cut edge at the hem. The dress has a gentle sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and hips.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend in various colours and designs.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with lace trims around the neckline and armholes.
